Catalano.Imaging.Texture.BinaryPattern

Class LocalAdaptiveTernaryPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Texture.BinaryPattern.LocalAdaptiveTernaryPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBinaryPattern

    public class LocalAdaptiveTernaryPattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBinaryPattern
    Local Adaptive Ternary Pattern (LATP) is a type of feature used for classification in computer vision. References: M. Akhloufi and A. Bendada, 2010. "Locally adaptive texture features for multispectral face recognition."
